name: Mr. Block Don't Give A !#@*
description:
Mr. Block is a simple man. He just wants to be left alone. 

But no, players always wanna play him. So if you can't be left alone he'll put an end to any smiling block he comes across. He'll fling !#@* every which way to get some peace and quiet. Best not get in his way because he don't give a...

Mr. Block Don't Give A !#@* is a short puzzle platformer made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam in under 48 hours. It features 20 levels and a balanced difficulty curve that increases as you go. The last levels will really test your mettle! Don't say I didn't warn you!

Controls: 

WASD Keys-move and jump.

Space Bar-fling !#@* at cursor.

Mouse-move cursor.

Left Mouse Button-fling !#@* at cursor.

Right Mouse Button-jump.

Short message from creator: Hello! I hope you enjoy this title. It's my first ever game made in the Game Maker engine and it was a lot of fun learning the tools for the first time. Hopefully you find the experience rewarding!

Theme (Dual Purpose): Mr. Block can use his harsh words to interact with objects and the environment in multiple ways. Every object reacts in a different way.

Made in Game Maker. All resources besides music created by designer/programmer.

Designer/Programmer: Joseph Tate aka The Dink

8bit Dungeon Boss & 8bit Dungeon Level by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
